00002 
00003 public class TestStaticInitializer
00004 {
00005     public static void main(String[] args)
00006         throws Exception
00007     {
00008         System.out.println("Main");
00009         ClassTwo two = new ClassTwo();
00010         System.out.println("oneData = " + ClassOne.oneData);
00011     }
00012 }
00013 
00014 class ClassOne
00015 {
00016     public static String oneData;
00017     public static boolean initialized = false;
00018 
00019     public ClassOne()
00020     {
00021         System.out.println("ClassOne constructor");
00022         synchronized(this)
00023         {
00024             if(!initialized)
00025             {
00026                 initialize(this, "twoData");
00027             }
00028         }
00029     }
00030 
00031     public static void initialize(ClassOne one, String fieldName)
00032     {
00033         try
00034         {
00035             Field field = one.getClass().getField(fieldName);
00036             oneData = (String)field.get(one);
00037             System.out.println("ClassOne initilization run");
00038         }
00039         catch(Exception e)
00040         {
00041             System.out.println("Error: " + e.getClass().getName() +
00042                                ": " + e.getMessage());
00043         }
00044         initialized = true;
00045     }
00046 }
00047 
00048 class ClassTwo extends ClassOne
00049 {
00050     public static String twoData;
00051     public final static ClassTwo singleton = new ClassTwo();
00052 
00053     static {
00054         System.out.println("Static initializer run");
00055         twoData = "two";
00056     }
00057 
00058     {
00059         System.out.println("Normal initializer run");
00060     }
00061 
00062     public ClassTwo()
00063     {
00064         System.out.println("ClassTwo constructor");
00065     }
00066 }
